title: PUCSL approves power cuts for tomorrow
content: The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) has approved the request made by the Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) to have rotational power shedding for tomorrow (24) The permission was granted due to lack of fuel supply for power generation.Hence, PUCSL Chairman Janaka Ratnayake granted permission for a four hour and 40 minute-power cut for tomorrow for areas of A,B, C and 4 hours and 30 minutes in the other areas.
